verses.verse: The word <WH1697> that came to Yirmeyah-yahu <WH3414> from the YY <WH3068>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>,

Hear <WH8085> <WH8798> ye the words <WH1697> of this covenant <WH1285>, and speak <WH1696> <WH8765> unto the men <WH376> of Y'hudah <WH3063>, and to the inhabitants <WH3427> <WH8802> of Yerushalayim <WH3389>;

And say <WH559> <WH8804> thou unto them, Thus saith <WH559> <WH8804> the YY <WH3068> 'Elohim <WH430> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>; Cursed <WH779> <WH8803> be the man <WH376> that obeyeth <WH8085> <WH8799> not the words <WH1697> of this covenant <WH1285>,

Which I commanded <WH6680> <WH8765> your fathers <WH1> in the day <WH3117> that I brought them forth <WH3318> <WH8687> out of the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714>, from the iron <WH1270> furnace <WH3564>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, Obey <WH8085> <WH8798> my voice <WH6963>, and do <WH6213> <WH8804> them, according to all which I command <WH6680> <WH8762> you: so shall ye be my people <WH5971>, and I will be your 'Elohim <WH430>:

That I may perform <WH6965> <WH8687> the oath <WH7621> which I have sworn <WH7650> <WH8738> unto your fathers <WH1>, to give <WH5414> <WH8800> them a land <WH776> flowing <WH2100> <WH8802> with milk <WH2461> and honey <WH1706>, as it is this day <WH3117>. Then answered <WH6030> <WH8799> I, and said <WH559> <WH8799>, So be it <WH543>, O YY <WH3068>.

Then the YY <WH3068> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto me, Proclaim <WH7121> <WH8798> all these words <WH1697> in the cities <WH5892> of Y'hudah <WH3063>, and in the streets <WH2351> of Yerushalayim <WH3389>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, Hear <WH8085> <WH8798> ye the words <WH1697> of this covenant <WH1285>, and do <WH6213> <WH8804> them.

For I earnestly <WH5749> <WH8687> protested <WH5749> <WH8689> unto your fathers <WH1> in the day <WH3117> that I brought them up <WH5927> <WH8687> out of the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714>, even unto this day <WH3117>, rising early <WH7925> <WH8687> and protesting <WH5749> <WH8687>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, Obey <WH8085> <WH8798> my voice <WH6963>.

Yet they obeyed <WH8085> <WH8804> not, nor inclined <WH5186> <WH8689> their ear <WH241>, but walked <WH3212> <WH8799> every one <WH376> in the imagination <WH8307> of their evil <WH7451> heart <WH3820>: therefore I will bring <WH935> <WH8686> upon them all the words <WH1697> of this covenant <WH1285>, which I commanded <WH6680> <WH8765> them to do <WH6213> <WH8800>; but they did <WH6213> <WH8804> them not.

And the YY <WH3068> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto me, A conspiracy <WH7195> is found <WH4672> <WH8738> among the men <WH376> of Y'hudah <WH3063>, and among the inhabitants <WH3427> <WH8802> of Yerushalayim <WH3389>.

They are turned back <WH7725> <WH8804> to the iniquities <WH5771> of their forefathers <WH7223> <WH1>, which refused <WH3985> <WH8765> to hear <WH8085> <WH8800> my words <WH1697>; and they went <WH1980> <WH8804> after <WH310> other <WH312> 'elohim <WH430> to serve <WH5647> <WH8800> them: the house <WH1004> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> and the house <WH1004> of Y'hudah <WH3063> have broken <WH6565> <WH8689> my covenant <WH1285> which I made <WH3772> <WH8804> with their fathers <WH1>.

Therefore thus saith <WH559> <WH8804> the YY <WH3068>, Behold, I will bring <WH935> <WH8688> evil <WH7451> upon them, which they shall not be able <WH3201> <WH8799> to escape <WH3318> <WH8800>; and though they shall cry <WH2199> <WH8804> unto me, I will not hearken <WH8085> <WH8799> unto them.

Then shall the cities <WH5892> of Y'hudah <WH3063> and inhabitants <WH3427> <WH8802> of Yerushalayim <WH3389> go <WH1980> <WH8804>, and cry <WH2199> <WH8804> unto the 'elohim <WH430> unto whom they offer incense <WH6999> <WH8764>: but they shall not save <WH3467> <WH8686> them at all <WH3467> <WH8687> in the time <WH6256> of their trouble <WH7451>.

For according to the number <WH4557> of thy cities <WH5892> were thy 'elohim <WH430>, O Y'hudah <WH3063>; and according to the number <WH4557> of the streets <WH2351> of Yerushalayim <WH3389> have ye set up <WH7760> <WH8804> altars <WH4196> to that shameful thing <WH1322>, even altars <WH4196> to burn incense <WH6999> <WH8763> unto Baal <WH1168>.

Therefore pray <WH6419> <WH8691> not thou for this people <WH5971>, neither lift up <WH5375> <WH8799> a cry <WH7440> or prayer <WH8605> for them: for I will not hear <WH8085> <WH8802> them in the time <WH6256> that they cry <WH7121> <WH8800> unto me for their trouble <WH7451>.

What hath my beloved <WH3039> to do in mine house <WH1004>, seeing she hath wrought <WH6213> <WH8800> lewdness <WH4209> with many <WH7227>, and the holy <WH6944> flesh <WH1320> is passed <WH5674> <WH8799> from thee? when thou doest evil <WH7451>, then thou rejoicest <WH5937> <WH8799>.

The YY <WH3068> called <WH7121> <WH8804> thy name <WH8034>, A green <WH7488> olive tree <WH2132>, fair <WH3303>, and of goodly <WH8389> fruit <WH6529>: with the noise <WH6963> of a great <WH1419> tumult <WH1999> he hath kindled <WH3341> <WH8689> fire <WH784> upon it, and the branches <WH1808> of it are broken <WH7489> <WH8804>.

For the YY <WH3068> TZva'ot <WH6635>, that planted <WH5193> <WH8802> thee, hath pronounced <WH1696> <WH8765> evil <WH7451> against thee, for <WH1558> the evil <WH7451> of the house <WH1004> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> and of the house <WH1004> of Y'hudah <WH3063>, which they have done <WH6213> <WH8804> against themselves to provoke me to anger <WH3707> <WH8687> in offering incense <WH6999> <WH8763> unto Baal <WH1168>.
And the YY <WH3068> hath given me knowledge <WH3045> <WH8799> of it, and I know <WH3045> <WH8689> it: then thou shewedst <WH7200> <WH8689> me their doings <WH4611>.

But I was like a lamb <WH3532> or an ox <WH441> that is brought <WH2986> <WH8714> to the slaughter <WH2873> <WH8800>; and I knew <WH3045> <WH8804> not that they had devised <WH2803> <WH8804> devices <WH4284> against me, saying, Let us destroy <WH7843> <WH8686> the tree <WH6086> with the fruit <WH3899> thereof, and let us cut him off <WH3772> <WH8799> from the land <WH776> of the living <WH2416>, that his name <WH8034> may be no more remembered <WH2142> <WH8735>.

But, O YY <WH3068> TZva'ot <WH6635>, that judgest <WH8199> <WH8802> righteously <WH6664>, that triest <WH974> <WH8802> the reins <WH3629> and the heart <WH3820>, let me see <WH7200> <WH8799> thy vengeance <WH5360> on them: for unto thee have I revealed <WH1540> <WH8765> my cause <WH7379>.

Therefore thus saith <WH559> <WH8804> the YY <WH3068> of the men <WH582> of Anathoth <WH6068>, that seek <WH1245> <WH8764> thy life <WH5315>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, Prophesy <WH5012> <WH8735> not in the name <WH8034> of the YY <WH3068>, that thou die <WH4191> <WH8799> not by our hand <WH3027>:

Therefore thus saith <WH559> <WH8804> the YY <WH3068> TZva'ot <WH6635>, Behold, I will punish <WH6485> <WH8802> them: the young men <WH970> shall die <WH4191> <WH8799> by the sword <WH2719>; their sons <WH1121> and their daughters <WH1323> shall die <WH4191> <WH8799> by famine <WH7458>:
And there shall be no remnant <WH7611> of them: for I will bring <WH935> <WH8686> evil <WH7451> upon the men <WH582> of Anathoth <WH6068>, even the year <WH8141> of their visitation <WH6486>.
